title: Linguistic Analysis Pedagogy for Writing Development in Secondary School Students

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of sentence structure and basic grammar, with secondary education-level writing experience
context.additional_context: Course for mathematics majors to enhance secondary education writing instruction competencies, applying digital device-based data analysis and feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can identify sentence-level linguistic development patterns by analyzing age-specific writing samples from middle and high school students.
Learners can evaluate writing effectiveness metrics (complexity, coherence, accuracy) using linguistic analysis tools.
Learners can design age-specific customized writing instruction strategies based on analysis results and apply them to project reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
